notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago during the past week:
S. H. Thorst to Elida Johnson: Melrose Street, west of Racine Avenue. Price, $3,000.
C. Ketterstrom to R. Kieniosen: Perry Street, north of Irving Park Boulevard. Price, $1.
J. A. Johnson to Anna . Schilling: North 56th Avenue, corner of Grace Street. Price, $600.
J. Shannon to C. J. A. Gustafson: 82nd Street, west of Reynolds Avenue. Price, $1,500.
Washington Park Club to Ida Holmgren: Evans Avenue, north of 63rd Street. Price, $1,120.
Isabella Curren to Florence Williamson: 47th Street, west of Ellis Avenue. Price, $5,000.
Emma J. C. Johnson to Henry E. Johnson: Fairfield Avenue, south of Armitage Avenue. Price, $1,500.
Johnson Chair Manufacturing Company to Johnson Chair Company: North Avenue, corner of North 44th Avenue. Price, $1.
W. B. Sawyer to Hansen: North Avenue, east of Whipple Street. Price, $7,300.
G. Halvorson to G. Walk: Whipple Street, north of Schubert Avenue. Price, $6,000.
